infoBlocks.heading: Why LEDs?
list: They use up to 60% less power
They have a lifespan of 50k hours
They don't begin dimming until 25k hours

infoBlocks.heading: Why Petersen Parts' LEDs?
list: Built with a shatterproof poly-carbonite lens
Built to detailed specs for longer lasting lights

blogItem.description: Did you know that NASA has been testing the use of LED lights on the International Space Station (ISS)?
blogItem.title: Let there be (better) light!
